title: Update portfolio resume content from screenshot + conditional section rendering

requirements.summary: Extract resume details from the uploaded screenshot and replace placeholder content in resumeData with Fatima Chowdhury’s education, experience, and skills.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/resumeData.ts no longer contains the placeholder identity (e.g., “Alex Johnson”) and is updated to reflect the uploaded resume (Fatima Chowdhury; Detroit, MI; email chowdhuryz313@gmail.com; education, experience, and skills from the screenshot).

Education entries include Wayne State University (BS in Computer Science; University Honors Co-Major; Anticipated 2029) and Cass Technical High School (Chemical/Biological; GPA 3.9; June 2025), preserving locations shown in the resume.

Experience entries include GDYT – The Lawn Academy (Employee; Hamtramck, MI; Summers 2023, 2024 & 2025) and Edible Arrangements (Employee; Detroit, MI; May 2024), with bullet points represented as highlights.
Skills are populated with the “TECHNICAL & PROFESSIONAL SKILLS” bullets from the resume.

file_operations.description: Replace placeholder resume content with the extracted details from “Screenshot 2026-02-05 150324.png”: Fatima Chowdhury, Detroit, MI, chowdhuryz313@gmail.com; education (Wayne State University; Cass Technical High School); experience (GDYT – The Lawn Academy; Edible Arrangements) with bullet points mapped to highlights; skills populated from “TECHNICAL & PROFESSIONAL SKILLS”. Ensure projects/contactLinks reflect only what exists in the resume (likely empty arrays).
Make experience rendering tolerant of resumes that only have highlights (e.g., hide the description paragraph when exp.description is empty) to avoid empty layout blocks.
Ensure hero text blocks (headline and/or summary) don’t render empty placeholders/spacing when resumeData fields are empty (conditionally render only when non-empty).
Ensure About section summary paragraph does not render an empty block if resumeData.summary is empty (conditionally render).

requirements.summary: Add a phone number field to the resume data model and render it alongside existing contact information.
acceptanceCriteria: The resume data model includes a phone number field populated with “(313)-419-2063” from the resume screenshot.
The phone number is displayed in at least one appropriate existing section that presents contact details (e.g., About and/or Contact).
If the phone field is empty, the UI does not render an empty label/value row for it.

file_operations.description: Extend the ResumeData interface with a phone field and populate it with “(313)-419-2063” from the screenshot.
Render phone alongside Location and Email in the contact info grid, with conditional rendering so no empty label/value row is shown when phone is missing.
Display the phone number in the Contact section (e.g., as an additional contact row) with conditional rendering so nothing is shown when resumeData.phone is empty.

requirements.summary: Conditionally hide empty sections/blocks (e.g., Projects and social links) and keep top navigation in sync so it doesn’t link to hidden sections.
acceptanceCriteria: If resumeData.projects is empty, the Projects section does not render an empty grid on the page.
If a section is hidden due to empty content, the top navigation does not include a link to that hidden section.
If resumeData.contactLinks is empty, the Contact section does not render an empty “Connect With Me” area.

file_operations.description: If resumeData.projects is empty, return null (or otherwise avoid rendering the section) so no empty grid/layout appears.
Conditionally render <ProjectsSection /> only when resumeData.projects has items, preventing an empty Projects section from being mounted.
Generate navigation links dynamically based on which sections are actually present (e.g., include Projects only when resumeData.projects has items), so the top nav never links to hidden sections.
Conditionally render the “Connect With Me” social links area only when resumeData.contactLinks has items, avoiding an empty block when contactLinks is empty.
